items.question: What is the apartment's capacity?
items.answer: The apartment can accommodate up to 4 guests: 1 double bed in the bedroom and 1 sofa bed in the living room.

items.question: Is there an elevator?
items.answer: No, the apartment is on the 2nd floor without an elevator. The corridor is narrow, typical of 17th-century buildings.

items.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
items.answer: Check-in from 3 PM, check-out before 11 AM. Flexible arrangements can be discussed.

items.question: Is WiFi included?
items.answer: Yes, free high-speed WiFi is included.

description.title: Welcome Home
description.text1: Welcome to our apartment, a cozy retreat completely renovated in the heart of Paris. Nestled in a 17th-century building, it has kept all its period charm: exposed wooden beams, stone walls, and that special atmosphere of old Parisian buildings.
description.text2: Located on Rue François Miron, one of Paris' oldest streets, you'll be in the heart of Le Marais with its unique neighborhood life. Boutiques, cafés, restaurants, art galleries... everything is within walking distance.
description.text3: Saint-Paul metro station (line 1) is 200 meters away and provides direct access to the Champs-Élysées, the Louvre, and Bastille.

notes.title: Good to Know
items: The main hallway is narrow, typical of period buildings in Le Marais.
The apartment is on the 2nd floor without an elevator.

history.title: History
history.content: Le Marais is one of the few Parisian neighborhoods to have preserved its pre-Haussmann architecture. Its 17th-century mansions, cobblestone streets, and historic squares make it a unique place.
